description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.On2ZrPJTe8FURsXY]{Operative Exploit}

You can sense your surroundings without needing to see them. You gain @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.rX5rK6UWAIOeeipl.JournalEntryPage.p0o9tmWtKZ0qy8DI#blindsense]{blindsense} with a range of 60 feet. You must have @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.rX5rK6UWAIOeeipl.JournalEntryPage.p0o9tmWtKZ0qy8DI#darkvision]{darkvision} and @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.rX5rK6UWAIOeeipl.JournalEntryPage.p0o9tmWtKZ0qy8DI#low-light-vision]{low-light vision}, or the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.P6aQ6Wpt5KOZEjIF]{nightvision} exploit, to learn this exploit.
